Name: Andrew Healey
Review text: Andrew did an amazing job! He was flexible with scheduling, efficient and thorough with the work, and very professional and courteous! I plan to use Duff Tree Service again in the future.

Name: Angie M
Review text: Highly recommend! Very professional from start to finish. Completed the job quickly. The clean up was amazing as if it never happened. Could not be more pleased.

Name: Steve Zimmerman
Review text: Duff tree Service is a solid, reliable company. This is the 3rd time I have called upon them and have not been disappointed.

Name: Jennifer D
Review text: Andrew was so helpful and did a great job!!! Super responsive and knowledgeable! Highly recommend!

Name: Scott Williams
Review text: Andrew Duff runs a tight ship. Professional and courteous, he discussed the removal of a broken limb with me, suggested some changes to my existing trees and ways to improve the overall landscape with tree changes. Given the location of the branch removal and the efforts of Andrew and his assistant, the rather large branch was removed without incident and the tree materials cleaned up from the yard and carted away. Recommend Duff Tree Service highly. Great service and reasonably priced. A Great combination!

Name: Tim P
Review text: Fast response for estimate and work. Careful trimming on neighbor's tree that extends over my property. I recommend Duff Tree Service highly!

Name: Stacy Sliva
Review text: Reasonable prices and efficient work! He also has a deep appreciation and understanding of native trees and was able to help me save my 50 year old burr oak after it was hit by a massive wind storm.
